message: Hi, I'm using SpringSource Tool Suite. My grails project has been running fine in the past, but after I applied a couple updates I get this error: http://paste2.org/p/1306474
Do you run it on Windows or Linux
I also tried cleaning the project, restarting, and re-importing from subversion
Does the project run well when using command line? Is it really STS issue or Grails itself?
It runs fine if run from command line. I think it is an STS issue.
yes exactly, I also tried a fresh copy of STS but no luck. I guess I will just use the command line for now
ok then, thanks for your help
I might try that, is it better than STS? The problem is my dev team uses STS

very strange issue
and in grails community doesnt look like anyone experience it

when you get used to it, it's great
it works very well and i think it has the best integration with grails

don't know what is your policy about licences
but intellij idea is a great tool for java and specially for grails :)
FYI this error was fixed when I updated to STS 2.6.0 RELEASE. Everything works great now!
